article.title: BAE Systems to Equip Army Stryker, Abrams Vehicles With Thermal Cameras
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: BAE Systems will equip U.S. Army Stryker combat vehicles and M-1 Abrams tanks with thermal cameras so combat crews can "see" outside the vehicles while remaining inside. The company received a $45 million contract from General Dynamics to produce the camera systems.
